duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and organize case files, track deadlines, and provide administrative support to attorneys within a law firm setting.
Reserve new matter numbers from accounting and docket new patent and trademark applications.
Review and process transfer-in files and update the docket system accordingly.
Docket incoming correspondences and clear the docket on a daily basis to ensure deadlines are met.
Prepare client status reports for attorneys as needed and provide assistance with overflow docketing and coverage.
Process attorney special requests including case closing, client matter changes, assignment changes, etc.
Perform electronic searches with the USPTO, WIPO, and Foreign websites as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience
